item.title: Hidden treasures: Kladmen (The Dropman)
item.description: Searching and finding The kladman often has to search as well. For suitable and always new places and ways to hide the goods. In such a way that they can be found by those looking, without being seen by those who don’t know.

item.title: The Chemodan – Our Hip-Hop (Наш Хип-Хоп)
item.description: By The Chemodan (Facebook, VK). Featuring Эфди Вадим (Efdi/fd Vadim, VK) and ОУ74 (24smi, VK). Video featuring Denis Sladkov (Denis Sladkov). Directed by Лёша Ломов (Lesja Lomov, Instagram, YouTube). From Абсурд и аллегория (2015). Lyrics More Круги под глазами (2014) Запах Урбана (with Brick Bazuka) (2014) Выживший выкидыш (2014) Read The Chemodan: “I’m like a football fan.
